sections.general:
INFORMATION DESIGNER
Summary of Qualifications
Strong leadership, project management, System Administration and technical skills to meet the efficiency and optimization needs. Has 3+ years of
professional experience in managing, developing and maintaining software systems, web applications, and database systems. Experience in
Unix/Linux System Administration, Oracle Database Administration (11g), MySQL database administration, Ellucian Banner ERP, and Oracle
Application Express(APEX).Educated with solid math background and equipped with strong problem solving skills
Technical Skills
Languages : C, C++, C#.NET, Java, Python, PHP, Mathematica, Oracle, PL/SQL, MySQL, XHTML/CSSÂ
Environment: Windows, UNIX, Linux(Red Hat), Windows Server, WAMP, LAMP Â
Softwares IDE : TOAD for Oracle, SQL Developer, Visual Studio, Eclipse, NetBeans, Dev-C++, Notepad++,Microsoft OfficeÂ
